Company: Franciscan Missionaries of Our Lady Health System, Inc.
Parent Company: Franciscan Missionaries of Our Lady Health Systems
Description: The Department of Justice reached 70 settlements involving 457 hospitals in 43 states for more than $250 million related to cardiac devices that were implanted in Medicare patients in violation of Medicare coverage requirements.

Company: Our Lady of Lourdes Regional Medical Center
Parent Company: Franciscan Missionaries of Our Lady Health Systems
Description: Our Lady of Lourdes Regional Medical Center agreed to pay the United States $3.8 million to settle claims that it defrauded Medicare, TRICARE and Medicaid from 1999 to 2003.

Company: Franciscan Missionaries of Our Lady Health Systems
Parent Company: Franciscan Missionaries of Our Lady Health Systems
Private Litigation Case Title: Nicholson v. Franciscan Missionaries of Our Lady Health Systems et al
